title: Fire Island National Seashore: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours               Guided Tours          Join a Park Ranger  Ranger-guided programs offer an in-depth look at Fire Island's natural and cultural features.  Each Seashore site offers ranger-guided activities the highlight the site's special resources, including Old Mastic House tours at the William Floyd Estate and Sunken Forest and Salt Marsh Nature Trail tours on the barrier beach. Fire Island Treks and Watch Hill canoe tours are special activities that take place during the warmer months.   Visit our Calendar to see a list of scheduled programs and activities.
